name: Supreme-Fortnight
description:
Where are you?

For some unknown reason, you wake up in a mysterious environment, enclosed inside a locked room. It seems like there's no way out. Or is there?

Luckily for you, however you ended up in this situation, you've also found a convenient set of tools that will serve to assist your escape, a mysterious suit that comes with the equipment to phase through materials, teleport, and cause signal interferences against the machines that patrol this environment. Now, the power is in your hands to weaponize these tools to get back home and figure out the mystery of how you ended up in this mess. 

Instructions:

WASD + Space bar + Mouse to walk/jump/aim, Shift to run

Hold E to go ethereal and phase through items with a blue ambience

- Be mindful of the watch, the watch will tell you how much charge you have left and when charge is being consumed

- Charge is recharged over time.

Press 1 to set the teleportation device as active, and 2 to set the distraction device as active

- LMB to aim

- RMB to drop the device where the player is standing

- (Teleportation): Press R to teleport to the device, or V to recall

Credits:

Jim Wu, Aiden Jiang, Hector Benitez, Yuyang Wei
